page.title: 07Arable farming
page.content: We interviewed a farmer in our area whose farm is like most others.He has got horses but no other animals at the moment.Crops are more important than animals.He grows oil seed rape, wheat barley,peas and rye.He has just started to grow peas.This new crop makes the soil fertile.He harvests in August.He has 560 acres of land.He has only two people working on the farm and two more local people at harvest time but long ago there were lots from the village.He grows oil seed rape in one field then winter wheat for 2 years, peas, winter wheat again and barley for 2 years in rotation.Farm life on his farm has changed a lot.His farm used to be a dairy farm and there were lots of others in the area.The last dairy farm was sold in 1984.So there have been great changes from dairy to arable.
